services.name: Starter Plan
services.description: Ideal for small clinics and inspectors. Includes AI-powered public health compliance monitoring and monthly reports.

services.name: Professional Plan
services.description: Perfect for healthcare networks and agencies. Includes everything in Starter, plus automated risk assessment and priority support.

services.name: Enterprise Plan
services.description: For governments, hospitals, and global organizations. Includes all services, custom compliance dashboards, and a dedicated analyst.

services.name: Add-On: Policy & Regulation Analysis
services.description: In-depth AI analysis of evolving public health regulations. Great for legal and policy teams.

notes: All plans are billed monthly. Annual billing available upon request.
Custom pricing available for enterprise clients.
Includes onboarding assistance and email support.
